title: Lefty's Fresh Food
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Uses fresh ingredients, and baking is done from-scratch. Many vegetarian choice are marked on menu and will make a veg dish vegan if it's not already. Sample dishes such as Thai peanut stir fry, tomato bruschetta flatbread, black bean and rice wrap, salads (cranberry spinach, Mediterranean, Thai).
